law.catch_line: Association of producers not illegal or in restraint of trade.
law.text: No association meeting or activity undertaken in pursuance of the provisions of KRS 247.5061 to 247.5095 and intended to benefit all of the producers, handlers, dealers, and processors of small grains shall be deemed or considered illegal or in restraint of trade.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 397, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990.
